info.name: Small Noise By RikR [97 Chars]
info.description: Small Noise By Rik Riesmeijer in 97 characters, tried to simplify some of my other concepts for noise on other shaders.

renderpass.code:
void mainImage(out vec4 c, vec2 v) {  // Small Noise By Rik Riesmeijer.
    uvec4 u = uvec4(v + 3e7, v);      // Add constant to fix duplicated UVs.
    u ^= u * u.zwxy;                  // Order 2 action of lossless block cipher.
    c = vec4(u * u.yzwx) / vec4(-1u); // Order 1 to get order 3 effect (rgb).
}                                     // License: Copyright Free (CC0).
renderpass.name: Image
